# visibleCells

**Instance Property**

An array of visible cells currently displayed by the collection view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var visibleCells: [UICollectionViewCell] { get }
```

## Return Value

An array of [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICollectionViewCell] objects. If no cells are visible, this method returns an empty array.

## Discussion

This method returns the complete list of visible cells displayed by the collection view.

## Related Documentation

- **indexPathsForVisibleItems**: An array of the visible items in the collection view.

## Getting the state of the collection view

- **numberOfSections**: The number of sections displayed by the collection view.
- **numberOfItems(inSection:)**: Fetches the count of items in the specified section.
